code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{enqueueCrawl}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CrawlPage(){const[seed,setSeed]=useState('https://example.com');const[depth,setDepth]=useState(1);const[tor,setTor]=useState(false);const[busy,setBusy]=useState(false);const[msg,setMsg]=useState('');async function submit(){setBusy(true);setMsg('queueing...');try{const out=await enqueueCrawl({seed,depth,tor});setMsg(out!==null&&out!==void 0&&out.queued?'queued':'failed');}catch(e){setMsg('failed');}finally{setBusy(false);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Crawl"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:seed,onChange:e=>setSeed(e.target.value),style:{minWidth:360}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",min:"0",max:"5",value:depth,onChange:e=>setDepth(Number(e.target.value))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"row",style:{gap:6},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:tor,onChange:e=>setTor(e.target.checked)})," Tor"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",disabled:busy,onClick:submit,children:"Queue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"muted",style:{marginLeft:8},children:msg})]})]});}
